entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2 except plus 2 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2 except plus 2 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 10 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
